00032 // -------
00033 // destroy
00034 // -------
00035 
00036 template <typename A, typename BI>
00037 BI destroy (A& a, BI b, BI e) {
00038     while (b != e) {
00039         --e;
00040         a.destroy(&*e);}
00041     return b;}
00042 
00043 // ------------------
00044 // uninitialized_copy
00045 // ------------------
00046 
00047 template <typename A, typename II, typename BI>
00048 BI uninitialized_copy (A& a, II b, II e, BI x) {
00049     BI p = x;
00050     try {
00051         while (b != e) {
00052             a.construct(&*x, *b);
00053             ++b;
00054             ++x;}}
00055     catch (...) {
00056         destroy(a, p, x);
00057         throw;}
00058     return x;}
00059 
00060 // ------------------
00061 // uninitialized_fill
00062 // ------------------
00063 
00064 template <typename A, typename BI, typename U>
00065 BI uninitialized_fill (A& a, BI b, BI e, const U& v) {
00066     BI p = b;
00067     try {
00068         while (b != e) {
00069             a.construct(&*b, v);
00070             ++b;}}
00071     catch (...) {
00072         destroy(a, p, b);
00073         throw;}
00074     return e;}

00080 template < typename T, typename A = std::allocator<T> >
00081 class Deque {
00082     public:
00083         // --------
00084         // typedefs
00085         // --------
00086 
00087         typedef A                                        allocator_type;
00088         typedef typename allocator_type::value_type      value_type;
00089 
00090         typedef typename allocator_type::size_type       size_type;
00091         typedef typename allocator_type::difference_type difference_type;
00092 
00093         typedef typename allocator_type::pointer         pointer;

00095 
00096         typedef typename allocator_type::reference       reference;

00098 
00099     public:
00100         // -----------
00101         // operator ==
00102         // -----------
00103 
00107         friend bool operator == (const Deque& lhs, const Deque& rhs) {
00108             return (lhs.size() == rhs.size()) && !lexicographical_compare(lhs.begin(), lhs.end(), rhs.begin(), rhs.end()) &&
00109                 !lexicographical_compare(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), lhs.begin(), lhs.end());}
00110 
00111         // ----------
00112         // operator <
00113         // ----------
00114 
00118         friend bool operator < (const Deque& lhs, const Deque& rhs) {
00119             return lexicographical_compare(lhs._front, lhs._back, rhs._front, rhs._back);}

00126         allocator_type _a;
00127         typename A::template rebind<T*>::other _a2;
00128         int ROWS;
00129         int COLUMNS;
00130         T** container;
00131         unsigned int _size;
00132         unsigned int tsize;
00133         T* _front;
00134         T* _back;

00137         T** oback;
00138 
00139     private:
00140         // -----
00141         // valid
00142         // -----
00143 
00144       bool valid () const {
00145           int rowOffset = _size/10;
00146           if(_front == *startRow && _size%10 == 0 && _size > 0)
00147           {
00148               rowOffset -= 1;
00149           }
00150           return  (!_front && !_back && !ofront && !oback) || ((_front < *startRow + COLUMNS) && (_back <= *(startRow + rowOffset) + COLUMNS));}

00273                 iterator& operator ++ () {
00274                     if((p+1) == end)
00275                     {
00276                         p = end;
00277                     }
00278                     else if((index == 9 && p != end) ||
00279                              (index == 10 && p == end))
00280                     {
00281                         row = row + 1;
00282                         if(p == end)
00283                         {
00284                             index = 1;
00285                         }
00286                         else
00287                         {
00288                             index = 0;
00289                         }
00290                         p = *row;
00291                     }
00292                     else
00293                     {
00294                         ++p;
00295                         index++;
00296                     }
00297                     assert(valid());
00298                     return *this;}

00310                 // operator --

00316                 iterator& operator -- () {
00317                     if(index == 0)
00318                     {
00319                         row = row - 1;
00320                         index = 9;
00321                         p = *row + 9;
00322                     }
00323                     else
00324                     {
00325                         --p;
00326                         index--;
00327                     }
00328                     assert(valid());
00329                     return *this;}
00330

00337                     assert(valid());

00339 
00340                 // -----------
00341                 // operator +=
00342                 // -----------
00343 
00347                     iterator& operator += (difference_type d) {
00348                       if((index + d > 9 && p != end) ||
00349                           (p == end && index + d > 10))
00350                       {
00351                         int temp = d - (10 - index);
00352                         if(!(d <= 10 && *row + d == end))
00353                           row++;
00354                         else
00355                           temp = d;
00356                         while(temp > 9)
00357                         {
00358                           if(*row + temp == end){
00359                             break;
00360                           }
00361                           temp -= 10;
00362                           row++;
00363                         }
00364                         index = temp;
00365                         p = *row + temp;
00366                       }
00367                       else
00368                       {
00369                         p += d;
00370                         index += d;
00371                       }
00372                       assert(valid());
00373                       return *this;}
00374 
00375                 // -----------
00376                 // operator -=
00377                 // -----------
00378 
00382                 iterator& operator -= (difference_type d) {
00383                     if(index - d < 0)
00384                     {
00385                         int temp = d - (index + 1);
00386                         row--;
00387                         while(temp > 9)
00388                         {
00389                             temp -= 10;
00390                             row--;
00391                         }
00392                         index = 9 - temp;
00393                         p = *row + index;
00394                     }
00395                     else
00396                     {
00397                         p -= d;
00398                         index -= d;
00399                     }
00400                     assert(valid());
00401                     return *this;}};

00657         Deque (const Deque& that, size_type c){
00658             _a = that._a;
00659             _a2 = that._a2;
00660             _size = that._size;
00661             tsize = c;
00662             while(tsize%10 != 0)
00663                 tsize++;
00664             ROWS = tsize/10;
00665             int thatRow = 0;
00666             int hml = _size;
00667             if(ROWS == 0)
00668                 ROWS = 1;
00669             COLUMNS = that.COLUMNS;
00670             container = _a2.allocate(ROWS);
00671             for(int i = 0; i < ROWS; i++)
00672               *(container + i) = _a.allocate(COLUMNS);
00673             if(that._size <= 10)
00674             {
00675                 uninitialized_copy(_a, that.begin(), that.end(), *container);
00676             }
00677             else
00678             {
00679                 uninitialized_copy(_a, that.begin(), that.begin() + 10, *container);
00680                 const_iterator it = that.begin() + 10;
00681                 hml = _size - 10;
00682                 thatRow = 1;
00683                 while(hml > 10)
00684                 {
00685                     uninitialized_copy(_a, it, it+10, *(container + thatRow));
00686                     it += 10;
00687                     hml -= 10;
00688                     thatRow++;
00689                 }
00690                 uninitialized_copy(_a, it, that.end(), *(container + thatRow));
00691             }
00692             _front = *container;
00693             _back = *(container + thatRow) + hml;
00694             startRow = container;
00695             ofront = container;
00696             oback = ofront + ROWS;
00697             assert(valid());
00698         }
00699

00701         // ------------

00708         explicit Deque (const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) {
00709             _a = a;
00710             ROWS = 10;
00711             COLUMNS = 10;
00712             tsize = 0;
00713             container = _a2.allocate(ROWS);
00714             _size = 0;
00715             _front = 0;
00716             _back = _front;
00717             startRow = container;
00718             ofront = container;
00719             oback = ofront + ROWS;
00720             assert(valid());}
00721 
00725         explicit Deque (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type(), const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) {
00726             _a = a;
00727             _size = s;
00728             tsize = s;
00729             while(tsize % 10 != 0)
00730                 tsize++;
00731             ROWS = tsize / 10;
00732             COLUMNS = 10;
00733             container = _a2.allocate(ROWS);
00734             for(int i = 0; i < ROWS; i++)
00735                 *(container + i) = _a.allocate(COLUMNS);
00736             int hml = _size;
00737             if(_size >= 10){
00738                 int start = (tsize - _size) / 2;
00739                 uninitialized_fill(_a, *container + start, *container + COLUMNS, v);
00740                 hml = hml - (COLUMNS - start);
00741                 int counter = 1;
00742                 while(hml > 10)
00743                 {
00744                     uninitialized_fill(_a, *(container + counter), *(container + counter) + COLUMNS, v);
00745                     hml -= 10;
00746                     counter++;
00747                 }
00748                 if(hml > 0){
00749                     uninitialized_fill(_a, *(container + counter), *(container + counter) + hml, v);
00750                 }
00751                 _front = *container + start;
00752                 if(hml == 0)
00753                     hml = 10;
00754                 _back = *(container + (ROWS - 1)) + hml;
00755             }
00756             else
00757             {
00758                 uninitialized_fill(_a, *container, *container + hml, v);
00759                 _front = *container;
00760                 _back = *container + hml;
00761             }
00762             startRow = container;
00763             ofront = container;
00764             oback = ofront + ROWS;
00765             assert(valid());}
00766 
00770         Deque (const Deque& that) {
00771             _a = that._a;
00772             _a2 = that._a2;
00773             _size = that._size;
00774             tsize = _size;
00775             while(tsize % 10 != 0)
00776               tsize++;
00777             ROWS = tsize/10;
00778             if(ROWS == 0)
00779                 ROWS = 1;
00780             COLUMNS = that.COLUMNS;
00781             container = _a2.allocate(ROWS);
00782             for(int i = 0; i < ROWS; i++)
00783               *(container + i) = _a.allocate(COLUMNS);
00784             int hml = _size;
00785             if(_size >= 10)
00786             {
00787                 int start = (tsize - _size) / 2;
00788                 uninitialized_copy(_a, that._front, *that.startRow + COLUMNS, *container + start);
00789                 hml = hml - (COLUMNS - start);
00790                 int counter = 0;
00791                 while(hml > 10)
00792                 {
00793                     counter++;
00794                     uninitialized_copy(_a, *(that.startRow + counter), *(that.startRow + counter) + COLUMNS, *(container + counter));
00795                     hml -= 10;
00796                 }
00797                 if(hml > 0){
00798                     counter++;
00799                     uninitialized_copy(_a, *(that.startRow + counter), that._back, *(container + counter));
00800                 }
00801                 _front = *container + start;
00802                 _back = *(container + counter) + hml;
00803             }
00804             else
00805             {
00806                 int start = (tsize - _size) / 2;
00807                 uninitialized_copy(_a, that._front, that._back, *container + start);
00808                 _front = *container + start;
00809                 _back = *container + hml;
00810             }
00811             startRow = container;
00812             ofront = container;
00813             oback = ofront + ROWS;
00814 
00815             /*int offset = that._front - that.container;
00816             _front = container + offset;
00817             _back = uninitialized_copy(_a, that._front, that._back, _front);

00819             assert(valid());}

00821         // ----------
00822         // destructor
00823         // ----------
00824 
00828             ~Deque () {
00829                 if(_front)
00830                 {
00831                     clear();
00832                     for(int i = 0; i < ROWS; i++)
00833                         _a.deallocate(*(container + i), COLUMNS);
00834                     _a2.deallocate(container, ROWS); 
00835                 }
00836                 /*assert(valid());*/}

00839         T* get_end(){

00841         }

00850         Deque& operator = (const Deque& rhs) {
00851             if(this == &rhs){
00852                 return *this;
00853             }
00854             else if (rhs.size() == size())
00855             {
00856                 std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), begin());
00857             }
00858             else if (rhs.size() < size())
00859             {
00860                 std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), begin());
00861                 resize(rhs.size());
00862             }
00863             else if (rhs.size() <= tsize)
00864             {
00865                 std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), begin());
00866                 iterator it = uninitialized_copy(_a, rhs.begin() + size(), rhs.end(), end());
00867                 _size = rhs.size();
00868                 _back = (it-1).get_pointer();
00869                 _back++;
00870             }
00871             else
00872             {
00873                 clear();
00874                 if(rhs.size() > tsize)
00875                 {
00876                     Deque<T> x(*this, rhs.size());
00877                     swap(x);
00878                 }
00879                 iterator it = uninitialized_copy(_a, rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), begin());
00880                 _size = rhs.size();
00881                 _back = (it-1).get_pointer();
00882                 _back++;
00883             }
00884 
00885                 /*---OLD CODE---
00886                 _a = rhs._a;
00887                 ROWS = rhs.ROWS;
00888                 container = _a2.allocate(rhs.tsize);
00889                 tsize = rhs.tsize;
00890                 int offset = rhs._front - rhs.container;
00891                 _front = container + offset;
00892                 _back = uninitialized_copy(_a, rhs._front, rhs._back, _front);
00893                 _size = rhs._size;
00894                 -----------------*/
00895             assert(valid());
00896             return *this;}

00907 
00911         const_reference operator [] (size_type index) const {
00912             return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->operator[](index);}
00913 
00914         // --
00915         // at
00916         // --
00917 
00921         reference at (size_type index) {
00922             return *(begin() + index);}
00923 
00927         const_reference at (size_type index) const {
00928             return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->at(index);}
00929 
00930         // ----
00931         // back
00932         // ----
00933 
00937         reference back () {
00938             return *(end()-1);}
00939 
00943         const_reference back () const {
00944             return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->back();}
00945 
00946         // -----
00947         // begin
00948         // -----
00949 
00953         iterator begin () {
00954             return iterator(_front, startRow, _front - *startRow, _size, _back, _front);}
00955 
00959         const_iterator begin () const {
00960             return const_iterator(_front, startRow, _front - *startRow, _size, _back, _front);}
00961 
00962         // -----
00963         // clear
00964         // -----
00965 
00969         void clear () {
00970             destroy(_a, begin(), end());
00971             _front = *(container + (ROWS/2)) + (COLUMNS/2);
00972             _back = _front;
00973             startRow = container + (ROWS/2);
00974             _size = 0;
00975             assert(valid());}
00976 
00977         // -----
00978         // empty
00979         // -----
00980 
00984         bool empty () const {
00985             return !size();}
00986 
00987         // ---
00988         // end
00989         // ---
00990 
00994         iterator end () {
00995             int rowOffset = 0;
00996             int index = 0;
00997             if((_front - *startRow) == 0 && (_size%10) == 0)
00998             {
00999                 rowOffset = (_size / 10) - 1;
01000                 index = 10;
01001             }
01002             else
01003             {
01004                 rowOffset = _size / 10;
01005                 index = _back - *(startRow + rowOffset);
01006             }
01007             return iterator(_back, startRow + rowOffset, index, _size, _back, _front);}
01008 
01012           const_iterator end () const {
01013             int rowOffset = 0;
01014             int index = 0;
01015             if((_front - *startRow) == 0 && (_size%10) == 0)
01016             {
01017                 rowOffset = (_size / 10) - 1;
01018                 index = 10;
01019             }
01020             else
01021             {
01022                 rowOffset = _size / 10;
01023                 index = _back - *(startRow + rowOffset);
01024             }
01025             return const_iterator(_back, startRow + rowOffset, index, _size, _back, _front);}
01026

01034         iterator erase (iterator it) {
01035             if(it == begin())
01036             {
01037                 _front = (begin() + 1).get_pointer();
01038                 _size--;
01039                 _a.destroy(&*it);
01040                 it = begin();
01041             }
01042

01073         // -----
01074         // front
01075         // -----
01076 
01080         reference front () {
01081             return *_front;}
01082 
01086         const_reference front () const {
01087             return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->front();}
01088 
01089         // ------
01090         // insert
01091         // ------
01092 
01096             iterator insert (iterator it, const_reference v) {
01097               int counter = 0;
01098             iterator temp = it;
01099             if(begin() == it)
01100             {
01101                 push_front(v);
01102                 temp = begin();
01103             }
01104             else if(end() == it)
01105             {
01106                 push_back(v);
01107                 temp = (end() - 1);
01108             }
01109             else
01110             {
01111                 if(_size == tsize)
01112                 {
01113                     while(begin() + counter != it){
01114                         counter++;
01115                     }
01116                     resize(tsize * 2);
01117                     it = begin() + counter;
01118                 }
01119                 if(!(end() == begin() + tsize)){
01120                     temp = end();
01121                     while(!(temp == it)){
01122                         *temp = *(temp - 1);
01123                         --temp;
01124                     }
01125                     *temp = v;
01126                     ++_size;
01127                     _back = (end() + 1).get_pointer();
01128                 } else {
01129                   iterator temp = begin() - 1;
01130                     while(!(temp == it)){
01131                         *temp = *(temp + 1);
01132                         ++temp;
01133                     }
01134                     *temp = v;
01135                     ++_size;
01136                     _front = (begin() - 1).get_pointer();
01137                 }
01138             }
01139             assert(valid());
01140             return temp;}
01141 
01142         // ---
01143         // pop
01144         // ---
01145 
01149         void pop_back () {
01150             _a.destroy(_back-1);
01151             _back = (end()-1).get_pointer();
01152             --_size;
01153             assert(valid());}
01154 
01158         void pop_front () {
01159             _a.destroy(_front);
01160             ++_front;
01161             --_size;
01162             assert(valid());}
01163 
01164         // ----
01165         // push
01166         // ----
01167 
01171         void push_back (const_reference v) {
01172             resize(_size+1, v);
01173             assert(valid());}
01174 
01178         void push_front (const_reference v) {
01179             if(_size == tsize)
01180             {
01181                 resize(tsize * 2);
01182             }
01183             if(_front == *container)
01184             {
01185                 iterator temp = end();
01186                 while(!(temp == begin()))
01187                 {
01188                     *temp = *(temp - 1);
01189                     temp--;
01190                 }
01191                 *temp = v;
01192                 _back = (end() + 1).get_pointer();
01193             }
01194             else
01195             {
01196                 *(begin() - 1) = v;
01197                 _front = (begin() - 1).get_pointer();
01198             }
01199             _size++;
01200             assert(valid());}
01201 
01202         // ------
01203         // resize
01204         // ------
01205 
01209         void resize (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type()) {
01210             if(s == _size)
01211                 return;
01212             else if(s < _size)
01213             {
01214                 iterator it = destroy(_a, begin() + s, end());
01215                 _back = (it-1).get_pointer() + 1;
01216                 _size = s;
01217             }
01218             else if(s <= tsize)
01219             {
01220                 _size = s;
01221                 int offset = (tsize - _size)/2;
01222                 int rowOffset = 0;
01223                 while(offset > 10)
01224                 {
01225                     offset -= 10;
01226                     rowOffset++;
01227                 }
01228                 _front = *(container + rowOffset) + offset;
01229                 iterator it = uninitialized_fill(_a, begin(), (begin() + _size), v);
01230                 _back = (it-1).get_pointer() + 1;
01231             }
01232             else
01233             {
01234                 if(s > (2 * _size))
01235                 {
01236                     Deque nDeque (s, v);
01237                     swap(nDeque);
01238                 }
01239                 else
01240                 {
01241                     Deque nDeque (2 * _size, v);
01242                     swap(nDeque);
01243                 }
01244             }
01245             assert(valid());}
01246 
01247         // ----
01248         // size
01249         // ----
01250 
01254         size_type size () const {
01255             return _size;}
01256 
01257         // ----
01258         // swap
01259         // ----
01260 
01264         void swap (Deque& that) {
01265           if (_a == that._a) {
01266             std::swap(_front, that._front);
01267             std::swap(_back, that._back);
01268             std::swap(container, that.container);
01269             std::swap(startRow, that.startRow);
01270             int tempROWS = ROWS;
01271             ROWS = that.ROWS;
01272             that.ROWS = tempROWS;
01273             int temp = tsize;
01274             tsize = that.tsize;
01275             that.tsize = temp;
01276             temp = _size;
01277             _size = that._size;
01278             that._size = temp;}
01279           else {
01280             Deque x(*this);
01281             *this = that;
01282             that = x;}
01283             assert(valid());}};
